alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 1:51AM MST until March 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 58 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Campbell County. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. The strong winds may cause blowing snow and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Persons outdoors should watch for flying or falling objects that may injure you. If you are driving, be prepared for sudden wind gusts that can cause you to lose control of your vehicle, especially on open stretches, or as you approach the crest of hills. Also be alert for debris or dust blowing across the road.
